/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks016.service.mapper.Pubwks016Mapper.selectPubwks016List */ SELECT A.BSRP_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MHS_BSRP WHERE BSRP_NO = A.BSRP_NO AND
ELCTSCT_SE_SN > A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN ) AS COPY_FLAG, A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN, A.BPLC_CODE, (SELECT BPLC_KOR_NM FROM STM_BIZPLC WHERE BPLC_CODE=A.BPLC_CODE) AS BPLC_CODE_NM, FNC_DATESTR(A.REQST_DE) AS REQST_DE, A.BSRP_NM, A.BSRP_PURPS, A.BSRP_SE_CODE, FNC_COMCODENM ('C024',A.BSRP_SE_CODE) AS BSRP_SE_NM, A.TRNSPORT_SE_CODE, FNC_COMCODENM ('C059',A.TRNSPORT_SE_CODE) AS TRNSPORT_SE_CODE_NM, A.REQST_EMPNO, FNC_GETKORNM(A.REQST_EMPNO) AS REQST_EMP_NM, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_SDT) AS BSRP_SDT, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_EDT) AS BSRP_EDT, A.STAYNG, A.STAYNG || '박' || A.STAYNG_DAYCNT || '일' AS STAYNG_DAYCNT, A.BUGT_CODE, A.ELCTSCT_DOC_NO, FNC_COMCODENM ('EA004',A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE) AS ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE_NM, A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE, A.ELCTSCT_EMPNO, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPT_DT, A.UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM, A.BSRP_CITY, (SELECT COUNT(BSRP_EMPNO) FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = A.BSRP_NO AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN) AS BSRP_EMP_CNT, (SELECT FNC_GETKORNM(BSRP_EMPNO) FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = A.BSRP_NO AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN AND ROWNUM = '1') AS BSRP_EMPNM
FROM MHS_BSRP A WHERE 1=1
AND A.BSRP_NO IN (SELECT A.BSRP_NO FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A , MHS_EMP B WHERE A.BSRP_EMPNO = B.EMPNO(+) AND B.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND (A.BSRP_EMPNO = #{reqstEmpno} OR A.REG_ID = #{reqstEmpno}))
AND A.BSRP_NO IN (SELECT A.BSRP_NO FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A WHERE (A.BSRP_EMPNO IN (SELECT EMPNO FROM MHS_EMP WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}) OR A.REG_ID IN (SELECT EMPNO FROM MHS_EMP WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode})))
AND A.BSRP_NO IN (SELECT A.BSRP_NO FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A , MHS_EMP B WHERE A.BSRP_EMPNO = B.EMPNO(+) AND (A.BSRP_EMPNO = #{reqstEmpno} OR A.REG_ID = #{reqstEmpno}))
AND A.ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE = #{elctsctSttusCode}
AND A.BSRP_SDT >= TO_DATE(#{sRegDt} || '000000','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
AND A.BSRP_EDT <= TO_DATE(#{eRegDt} || '235959','YYYY-MM-DDHH24MISS')
AND A.REQST_DE = #{reqstDe}
AND A.BSRP_NM LIKE '%' || #{bsrpNm} || '%'
ORDER BY A.BSRP_NO ASC , ELCTSCT_SE_SN ASC

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks016.service.mapper.Pubwks016Mapper.findPubwks016DtlList */ SELECT A.BSRP_NO, A.BSRP_EMPNO, A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN, A.VISIT_OFFIC_NM, A.VISIT_CN, A.DAY_AMT, A.CGFFD_AMT, A.STAYNG_AMT, A.TRNSPORT_AMT, A.LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT, A.DTY_VRSC_EMPNO, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.UPT_DT, A.UPT_ID, B.KOR_NM, B.CLSF_CODE, FNC_GETDEPTNM(B.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NM, FNC_GETCLSFNM(B.CLSF_CODE) AS CLSF_CODE_NM FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL A , MHS_EMP B WHERE A.BSRP_EMPNO = B.EMPNO(+) AND A.BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn}

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.pub.wks.pubwks016.service.mapper.Pubwks016Mapper.selectPubwks016 */ SELECT BSRP_NO, ELCTSCT_SE_SN, BPLC_CODE, FNC_DATESTR(A.REQST_DE) AS REQST_DE, FNC_GETKORNM(A.REQST_EMPNO) AS REQST_EMP_NM, BSRP_NM, BSRP_PURPS, BSRP_SE_CODE, TRNSPORT_SE_CODE, REQST_EMPNO, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_SDT) AS BSRP_SDT, FNC_DATESTR(A.BSRP_EDT) AS BSRP_EDT, SUBSTR(BSRP_SHR,1,2) || ':' || SUBSTR(BSRP_SHR,3,2) AS BSRP_SHR, SUBSTR(BSRP_EHR,1,2) || ':' || SUBSTR(BSRP_EHR,3,2) AS BSRP_EHR, STAYNG, STAYNG_DAYCNT, BUGT_CODE, ELCTSCT_DOC_NO, ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE, ELCTSCT_EMPNO, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM, BSRP_CITY FROM MHS_BSRP A WHERE A.BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND A.ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MHS_BSRP WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND
ELCTSCT_SE_SN > #{elctsctSeSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MHS_BSRP ( BSRP_NO, ELCTSCT_SE_SN, BPLC_CODE, REQST_DE, BSRP_NM, BSRP_PURPS, BSRP_SE_CODE, REQST_EMPNO, BSRP_SDT, BSRP_EDT, BSRP_SHR, BSRP_EHR, STAYNG, STAYNG_DAYCNT, TRNSPORT_SE_CODE, BUGT_CODE, EXCCLC_SN, ATCHMNFL_NO, REG_DT, REG_ID, BSRP_CITY ) SELECT BSRP_NO, (SELECT (MAX(ELCTSCT_SE_SN) + 1) FROM MHS_BSRP WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo}), BPLC_CODE, REQST_DE, BSRP_NM, BSRP_PURPS, BSRP_SE_CODE, REQST_EMPNO, BSRP_SDT, BSRP_EDT, BSRP_SHR, BSRP_EHR, STAYNG, STAYNG_DAYCNT, TRNSPORT_SE_CODE, BUGT_CODE, EXCCLC_SN, ATCHMNFL_NO, SYSDATE, #{regId}, BSRP_CITY FROM MHS_BSRP WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn} AND ELCTSCT_STTUS_CODE = '20'

INSERT INTO MHS_BSRP_DETAIL ( BSRP_NO, ELCTSCT_SE_SN, BSRP_EMPNO, VISIT_OFFIC_NM, VISIT_CN, DAY_AMT, CGFFD_AMT, STAYNG_AMT, TRNSPORT_AMT, LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT, DTY_VRSC_EMPNO, REG_DT, REG_ID ) SELECT BSRP_NO, (SELECT (MAX(ELCTSCT_SE_SN)+ 1) FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo}), BSRP_EMPNO, VISIT_OFFIC_NM, VISIT_CN, DAY_AMT, CGFFD_AMT, STAYNG_AMT, TRNSPORT_AMT, LOCAL_TRNSPORT_AMT, DTY_VRSC_EMPNO, SYSDATE, #{regId} FROM MHS_BSRP_DETAIL WHERE BSRP_NO = #{bsrpNo} AND ELCTSCT_SE_SN = #{elctsctSeSn}
